case.state: Oh, what do we have here?
My, my, doesn't this look like fun?
Ah, what's going on over here? Can I join in?
I'm so excited! I've been so bored with my usual pastimes recently!
It's been a while since I played cards. I hope I haven't gone too soft.
I've been looking for a little excitement! Things back home are so dull sometimes.
Hm, ~cards.text~ will do.
I'll have ~cards.text~, please.
~Cards.text~.
Oh, ~cards.text~ I suppose.
I usually make my own luck, but it's more exciting to just see how things will play out.
I hope you're all feeling as brave as I am!
Honestly, it might be more fun to lose! Hehe, only joking!
Oh, I'm in no rush. I have some doggies looking after my precious animals. They wouldn't dare let anything happen to them.
Ah, it's so nice to get away from the riverbank every once in a while. So many new faces!
I'll be happy with any result. I'm just here to have a little fun for myself!
It might be fun to play like this with some of the people under the bridge, but I get bored just playing with them all the time.
Did you get a hand better than mine? I don't think so!
If you didn't get good cards, maybe you should just get a do-over. It's not like it really matters!
Wow, ~trash~! You're really taking your time! Do you really think we want to stand around waiting for you?
Maybe ~trash~ will do something useful for once and lose this round for us!
Well, I'm waiting.
~Trash~! Are you ready to lose?
My, my, I hope I didn't get any of the cards ~trash~ had last round.
I hope a certain someone isn't forgetting their place.
I can't wait for ~trash~ to look all dismayed when he finds out he lost!
Come one, ~trash~! It's no fun if you just stand around looking like an idiot!
Uh-uh. No turning back now.
I wouldn't dream of going down without a fight!
You don't need to tell me not to count my chickens before they hatch. I've raised my fair share of hens down by the river.
I'm all set to win! He-he, or lose! It's so exciting not to know!
Don't worry about little 'ol me. I'm ready to go!
I hope everyone is having fun! I know I'm having a blast!
We played a lot of cards games when we were training to go to Venus. I think I got pretty good at them!
You would all fit in just perfectly with us under the bridge. Is anyone looking for a place to live?
It all just comes down to luck, doesn't it?
You have to be pretty brave to stick out this game, or just really horny. Hm, maybe it helps to be a bit of both.
~Trash~! Are your cards bad? Are you thinking about how you're going to lose?
Even if ~trash~ were to win, I wouldn't think he's cheating, no! I'm sure he's nowhere near smart enough for that!
Don't be nervous, ~trash~. It's not like we're expecting anything impressive from you.
Maybe it should be ~trash~'s turn to lose! Can we all just agree on that?
My, my, ~trash~, what are you doing? Oh, you're so cute. Pretending like you know what you're doing!
What's the hold up? Let's go.
Is everything alright, ~trash~? You're not having any trouble focusing, are you?
I hope you don't lose this time, ~trash~. I wouldn't want you to get discouraged and quit like a little crybaby loser before we get to really humiliate you.
Tick tock, ~trash~. Tick. Tock.
Whoops! Well, mistakes happen!
Losing is fun too, I'd say. I hope nobody is getting too nervous about it.
My, my, now this is the kind of heart-pounding excitement I've bee missing.
I'm not even sure I want to be the big winner, but playing to win is a lot of fun. I feel so invested each round!
Gambling with money is bad and you shouldn't do that sort of thing. You might end up living in a cardboard box under a bridge!
Ah, oh well. There is no reward without risk.
Looks like luck isn't on my side this time, but who knows?
I'm not so sure I'm going to come out on top this time around. What a shame!
Don't think any less of me when I lose, okay? I'm only human, after all!
I'm naming this hand ~trash~ because of how it's literally just garbage.
Did you get a good hand, ~trash~? Did you manage to do something right for once?
Don't go getting a big head, ~trash~.
I don't mind doing lewd things with you here, ~trash~. Why should I care? It's not like you matter!
My, my, seems like I'm going to lose this round unless some pond scum decides to pointlessly throw the round in my stead!
Let me see your hand, ~trash~. You may have cards that belong to me.
I'm not going to quit even if my luck is real bad! I wouldn't want to miss it if ~trash~ completely embarrasses himself!
I can live with losing, just so long as ~trash~ does too!
Are you waiting for me to lose, ~trash~? Pervert.
My, my, this is so exciting! I wonder what's going to happen!
Look how happy ~trash~ is I lost. Would you be happy if I just got completely naked right now? Is that what you want?
Lucky you, ~trash~! Looks like it's my turn! Should I get completely naked for you now? Would you like that? Hm?
Oh, look at ~trash~ getting all excited again! I'm not getting naked yet, so try not to soil yourself, okay?
Yes, it's me again! Don't get too excited, ~trash~, or you might lose what little control of your body you currently possess and make a mess!
My, my, ~trash~. I think you'll like this. Get ready to have your tiny little lizard brain blown!
Maybe I should reward ~trash~, even though he doesn't deserve it at all, but I should be nice to lower lifeforms.
Try to contain your excitement, ~trash~. We can't have you slobbering all over the place!
I know you're excited, ~trash~, but try to keep your creepy panting to yourself, okay?
You still with us, ~trash~, or has all your vital blood run to your limp dick instead of your peanut brain where you might actually get some use out of it?
Try to keep your jaw off the floor, ~trash~. It would be a shame if you accidentally swallowed a fly and had to spend the rest of your life atoning for it!
Looks like it's my turn! How exciting! It just wouldn't be right if I didn't strip at least once, right?
Oh no, is it me again? That's fine with me! It's no fun unless you get right down to your bare skin!
My, my, I really seem to be running out of options. Well, that doesn't mean I can't have a little fun with it.
Looks like you got me. Now this is where the real fun begins...
I was feeling a little left out. Now we can all be fully exposed together!
Looks like you got me! Don't worry, I'm a bit eager to get started on this...
My, my, I'll have to try a little bit harder! I don't want the fun to be over too soon!
Oh? Is it me again? Hm, I think I'll have a little fun with this one.
Ah, well done! I think you've all earned a reward! I'm sure you'd agree!
My, my! Seems like the real fun might start a little sooner for me than I expected!
So it's my turn? You won't hear me complaining. It's what I'm here for, right?
Ah, seems like I might be outmatched! Maybe I should try a little harder. It wouldn't be as fun to lose completely right away.
My, my, what a predicament I'm in. You're giving me a real run for my money.
Oh dear, things really aren't looking good for me, are they? Well, I suppose you've earned a reward for playing so well.
Down but not out, so they say. It might surprise you what I can do when backed into a corner!
You'll just have to be patient. Can you do that? Can pond scum like you hang on that long?
Mmm, no, I don't think so. I'll just take it one step at a time. Think you can hold on for a little while longer? It's not like you have anything better you could be doing.
My, my, so impatient. I'm going to have to teach you how to be patient and just wait. You can thank me later for elevating you slightly above being complete scum later.
Are you the kind of pervert who gets off on women's feet? Don't be shy, you can admit it. It's impossible for anyone to think any less of you than we already do.
Does the thought of seeing my feet fill you with excitement? Is that what you like? Are you a filthy little pervert who gets off on ladies shoes and feet?
Did you know there are some perverts out there who are obsessed with feet? They get all sweaty and bothered over the thought of a woman taking off her shoes. Kind of like ~trash~ here.
Won't you be glad to have this out of the way? Just the flimsy cloth of my apron separating you from a glorious view of my body?
Do you fantasize about women wearing just an apron? Does the thought of it turn you on? Can you hardly stand it?
How about I take off my dress so it's just my apron? Would you like that? Is that erotic enough for you?
Don't worry, I always play fair and square. No tricks. I'll strip and you'll get to see my breasts just like you wanted.
If you're worried I'm going to pull a fast one on you, just relax. I'll show you my naked breasts, just like you want.
There's no trick, I promise. I really am going to be exposing my breasts. I'd never cheat in a fair game!
Are you watching? I'd hate for you to miss a moment of this.
If a woman is showing herself to you, you'd best pay attention.
Pay close attention because I won't be repeating this.
It's nice to get away from everybody on the riverbank for a while. I can't remember the last time I took some time just for myself.
I don't get away from the riverbank too much since the farm keeps me busy. It's nice to get out for a bit and meet some new faces.
I figured i was overdue for a trip outside the riverbank. It's a lot of work running a farm, so it's hard to find time to just get out and socialize.
You might be wondering how I came to live under a bridge, but unfortunately for you that's a secret!
Maybe you're wondering to yourself how it is that I'm living under a bridge, and while you're free to wonder just now that is my business and mine alone.
If my living under a bridge is of great curiosity to you, I'm sorry to say that I'm not one to speak about how I came to be in this situation.
Here, I can slip right out of my dress like this...
This dress slips off quite easily, you see. Watch, I can take it off just like this...
This is a game, right? So I should make it exciting? How about I just, slip out of my dress like this...
It's been quite some time since anyone's seen me like this. Oh yes, quite some time indeed.
I can't even remember the last person who saw me like this. Guess it's been a while since those hectic years...
I'm not ashamed to say I'm a bit out of practice. I don't think anyone's seen me like this since... well, let's just say it's been some time.
There's not a lot of privacy by the river, so I don't spend a lot of time without my clothes on. I don't even get in the bath without a towel on. I have to since the bath is completely outside.
The Arakawa River is pretty cold, so it's not ideal for bathing. Luckily, we have a little oil barrel bathhouse with warm water. It is a little exposed to the elements though.
Farming is dirty work, so I do indulge in regular baths. We don't have running water, so we all bathe in a heated oil drum the community shares.
Ah, look at you. So vexed that a woman won't get naked for you straight away. How did a mangy dog like you get so self-important? Honestly, as if I have time to discipline a pervert like you.
I know you're just here to ogle women like the stupid pervert you are. Does it frustrate you that you have to obey the rules? Do you think anyone cares about the opinion of trash like you?
You can't even manage to wait a little while longer, can you? Practically foaming at the mouth at the thought of seeing a bit of skin. It's so sad to see garbage like you forgetting it's place.
If you're so into fee then, why don't you get down with your nose to the ground and stay with all the worms and filth you should rightfully call your betters.
Honestly, it's revolting that the dregs of society like you are allowed to wander the streets and soak up precious sunlight.
Don't even think about simpering and groveling at my feet for forgiveness, creep. Don't waste the oxygen it would require and just keep your distance.
Here, it's my little treat to you! No need to try and pay me back, it's not like your miserable life is long or consequential enough to ever hope to repay what I've done for you today!
I know you must feel like you've been blessed by a goddess, but don't try and repay my kindness. Really. Don't. I wouldn't want anything that came from you.
I'm so glad you like it! Don't feel obligated to do anything in return. I mean, you could try, but it seems silly for you to spend the rest of your life in painful atonement!
After all, who knows how many worms have seen me naked. What's another?
Besides, who cares if you see me like this? Who would you tell? Who would believe you? Like I said: who would care what you said?
I can hardly get upset about every single microscopic bottom-feeding insect that sees my body. That's just the way it is!
What's this? No applause? No "thank you, Maria?" "I am unworthy, Maria?" Have you lost the ability to be grateful? Could a skid mark like you be grateful in the first place?
I'm not seeing near enough groveling right now. Knees, hands, and face should be digging into the ground. No words. Just penitent silence. Don't just gawk, hop to it you slithering little leech.

Oy, this is your cue to be grateful. To show this much kindness to a lower life-form is practically saintly on my part. But do I get even a crumb of the proper supplication? My, my, what an ungrateful pervert.
I do have fun playing with Nino, P-ko, Jacqueline, and of course little Stella, but their idea of fun isn't always the same as mine. Sometimes I'd like to do something a little more mature.
It'll be good to interact with some new people for once! It'll give everyone back home a chance to recover too!
It's not like it's boring back home, but a girl gets curious, you know? Surely there's some fun to be had elsewhere too!
But I can tell you that I stick around there since I'm free to be who I really am. I can just live carefree and take care of my precious animals!
It's unconventional, but it is home! I'd rather not dwell on the past. Besides, it's in the past! I've got to live in the present!
It really is a lovely place, perfect for looking after all my animals. Nobody bothers me unnecessarily and some of my neighbors are lots of fun to play around with!
Ah, the men I've loved. I do wonder what's happened to them. Are they doing okay? Can they think of me without crying? Without screaming?
I've loved many men, but none of them ever stuck around. I guess you can't tie anyone down. Eventually they just chew through the leash.
I was reckless with my heart once. I've had my heart broken many a time. I've also broken my fair share of hearts. And legs. And spines. And wills.
My, my, isn't it exciting! Standing around in just an apron? Some men go absolutely crazy over it, idiots.
So, how's this? I never get a chance to walk around like this ever. I think it's pretty exciting...
Maybe it's a bit much, but when else will I get a chance to do this? So, is it sexy?
Well, modesty was never my strong suit anyhow, so taking baths outside doesn't bother me. Besides, the other residents know better than to try and take a peek at anyone while I'm on watch.
The riverbank is pretty far down from the footpath though. From all the way up there, you can hardly tell there's a nearly naked person in an oil drum!

Nino used to bath completely naked, but some policemen got upset with her. Now it's a rule you have to wear a towel, even after I took pains to teach those nice policemen to mind their own business like good boys.
Ah, of course he can't focus. Pervert.
Maybe next time keep your hands off your dick and on your cards. You haven't lost yet!
What's with this showing? Is your brain really so much mush you can't recognize numbers and shapes.
Are you serious? Shouldn't you be taking this seriously? You're really just going to blow it, just like that?
Loser.
Lecher.
Oh, you're still playing?
Just ~target~? What is he going to do? Disappoint us again?
Haven't you given up already? Why are you pretending to have a spine? It's creepy.
That's cute, ~target~, but we're all still playing seriously here. How about you go in the corner and we call you when it's time to be humiliated again?
Do your best, ~target~! We're all watching!
Did ~target~ lose? My, how utterly unsurprising!
Oh, did you lose, ~target~? Does the loss sting? Are you sad? You can tell me!
Way to lose, ~target~!
If luck is a lady, then she's wise to steer clear of ~target~!
My, my, seems like you could've won that round if only you were any good at this.
Look! ~Target~'s cards are just as worthless as he is!
Have you not figured out what the pictures and numbers on the cards mean yet? Ah, you're so hopeless.
Poor ~target~. He'll never be able to try hard enough to really win.
Maria will now act sadistic.
Don't sweat it, ~target~. Try and have fun with it!
How exciting for you, ~target~! Are you ready?
Sorry, ~target~, but fair is fair!
Looks like someone might've made a little mistake! I'm sorry, but it's your turn now!
Okay, it's ~target~'s turn! Should be fun!
Well, well, ~target~. Whatever will you do now?
Alright, ~target~! Don't bore me! No, I'm only kidding!
Don't lose your determination now! Let's see what you've got!
If it's ~target~'s turn then we're all in for a treat!
Oh? Nobody loses? That seems like a waste.
Ugh, what a boring man...
I knew it. No excitement at all.
If you had any spine at all, you wouldn't be doing this...
Oh, what a buzzkill.
Tch, learn to read a room.
I expected nothing and I am still disappointed.
Maybe have the decency to just lose and not waste our time, okay?
Honestly, they should give out medals for being this useless.
What is this? Preening? Literally not one person cares.
Do you think you're funny? Is that it? That's just sad...
Wow, how worthwhile. I know you have the brain of a snail, but let's not move like one, okay?
It should not be this abundantly clear why no one likes you. It's just embarrassing.
If you had anything worthwhile to show us, you'd have done so already.
Yes, well done. I'd clap for you, but even wasting the energy needed to talk to you is more than you deserve.
Don't pay any attention to ~trash~, ~target~. He has no self-control and should be ignored.
Now, don't rush ~target~, ~trash~. I know patience isn't your strong suit.
There's no need to trouble yourself on ~trash~'s behalf. Just take your time.
How about you just sit patiently and watch, ~trash~?
Oh, a pragmatist? I can respect that.
Well, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(have|has)~ to come off, ~clothing.ifPlural(don't they|doesn't it)~?
Ah, it's just good sense to take things one at a time.
My, my, I think you came more prepared than I did.
I'm glad to see you're not giving up until the very end, ~target~!
I admire a girl with courage like yours! Still, be careful you don't lose!
You're a tough one to keep down, aren't you? Well, it does make things fun!
You just might be in trouble if this next hand doesn't go well for you.
Try not to lose too much, ~target~. We wouldn't want ~trash~ getting a big head about it.
In the end, that was probably the right move, ~target~. We should probably keep ~trash~'s expectations slow for everyone's sake.
Just remember, ~target~, that no matter how much you lose the biggest loser will still always be ~trash~!
Maybe ~trash~ should hold ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ for you so it doesn't have to touch the ground. Then again, having ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ touch ~trash~ might be worse.
Looks like somebody is playing to win! I do so admire that spirit!
Bravo! Bravo! I'm sure your courage won't fail you yet!
I still think you should take off a little more. That's where the real fun begins!
Don't get too comfortable or you're liable to slip-up!
Is that all your going to be doing? Seriously?
My interest in you is dropping with each passing second.
At least be quick about it.
Fine, just do whatever you want, I guess.
Just when I thought you couldn't possibly lose with less dignity.
Next time just accept defeat, okay?
Being stubborn doesn't really suit you.
Maybe quit while you're behind.
Is this ever going to go anywhere?
Do the world a favor and just lose faster.
He can't even lose right...
What a waste.
Look away, ~trash~. This one's not for you.
Now, now, ~trash~. You get what you get and you don't complain.
Make sure to thank ~target~ for being so gracious, ~trash~!
Take a step back, ~trash~. You're crowding poor ~target~.
Trying not to attract any undue attention? I have a sense that's not going to work.
Are you stalling for time or just trying to seduce us with a slow burn?
You ever think that maybe you're just a bit of a tease, ~target~?
Oh? Will you give us a little show?
I'm glad we have you around to keep things lively, ~target~!
Did you come here just to show off? I don't blame you.
Brave girls like you are so cute. It's almost a shame you may have to lose.
Your company is so invigorating, ~target~. Any chance you want to come live down by the river?
Now let's unanimously agree to let ~trash~ just humiliate himself next round!
I don't think you're being near grateful enough, ~trash~. Do we need to work on that?
Much more than that and I'm afraid you'll break poor little ~trash~'s brain, ~target~!
~Trash~. The least you could do is muster a single "thank you."
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ really should be thanking you for making ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ look so good.
If you're having fun now, wait until you lose a few more hands...
Don't be afraid to really get into the spirit of things! Losing is half the fun!
Don't worry, it only gets better from here!
Make sure to thank Mr. ~clothing~ for doing such a good job of covering you up!
Are you going to take this one seriously? Do you really think that's smart?
~Target~? What do you think you're doing? Taking your ~clothing~ off in front of us like some kind of pervert?
It's not like we could take you seriously with your ~clothing~ on anyways.
You look so dumb...
His... his underwear...
... What a loser...
What... what a stupid look...
Ah, that wasn't near as exciting as I hoped. ~Target~ didn't whimper even a little bit.
Why are you stopping? Just keep going.
Over already? Such a disappointment.
We're going to have to see you lose again if that weak showing was your idea of a good time.
Trying to get ~trash~ all hot and bothered? That shouldn't be too hard.
Taking your ~clothing~ off? Did you forget ~trash~ was here? I do too sometimes.
Don't feel like you have to go big just for ~trash~'s sake. In fact, you don't need to do anything ever for him!
Try not to get ~trash~ excited while he's off his leash.
Oh! So bold!
C'mon, show off a little!
Ah, this should be fun!
Keeping things exciting, I see!
Maybe you should up the ante next time, ~target~! I don't think we've tortured ~trash~ quite enough yet!
~Trash~, would you kill you to try and look even slightly less perverted?
Do you think ~trash~ deserves to see more, ~target~? Hmm, what to do?
Try looking respectfully for once, ~trash~.
And you have such a great body, ~target~.
Anyone with a body like yours should be more than confident enough to play with us.
How did you end up so beautiful? Came by it naturally, I would assume?
Ah, it's such a waste for you to dress modestly.
Alright, let's see what we're working with here.
Let's get the ~clothing~ off so the ridicule can begin.
My, my, so brazen. As if we even really care what you've got going on under there.
Is this your attempt to impress us? That's so cute and pathetic!
Oh, what a big dumb brute you are? Sorry, I should have really been talking slower this whole time.
Wow, look at those muscles! It's incredible that someone could be so strong and so useless at the same time!
You've got such big muscles, but what are they even for? Seems like a bunch of wasted effort on your part!
I think it's adorable that you're not afraid of people seeing your weird muscly body.
If I wanted to see a hairy animal, I would have just stayed home.
So scruffy and dirty. Who'd be interested in a man with zero sense of hygiene?
Do you think having a hairy chest makes you look manly? It really just seems like you're trying too hard!
If you need to borrow some scissors, I've got some. I'd be more than happy to help you with this furry little problem you seem to be having.
Hm, nothing I haven't seen before.
Really not worth waiting around for.
Ah, I was hoping for something at least a little nice. My mistake for getting my hopes up.
Oh, just another useless male specimen.
Oh, so the pervert wants us to see his dick? Very well. Let's have it.
Such a desperate attempt to impress...
Don't pretend like you weren't eager to whip it out this whole time.
It's your funeral...
A pathetic showing for a pathetic man.
What else could I have expected from such a sniveling, sweaty little worm?
What's this useless thing? What good is that even for?
Aren't you ashamed for being so woefully inadequate?
So am I supposed to be impressed? By that? In what possible reality?
I guess that's all we an expect from a lecherous pervert like ~target~. What a let down.
Are we supposed to scream in terror or start drooling over it? All for that? Hardly.
What am I supposed to be getting excited about here? A bit of degenerate scum with his little dick out? You thought somehow that would be exciting?
Ew, it's grotesque. Who would want that sort of thing near them?
Don't tell me you're boldly overconfident because your gross penis is grosser than usual?
What a disgusting thing. You should be barred from public places.
That's not normal. Are you sure you don't have a disease of some sort?
~Trash~. Eyes. Closed.
I don't know if ~trash~ has really earned it, but it's your call, ~target~.
Hold on, ~target~. I want to hear ~trash~ say "please" first.
Seems like a waste for ~trash~ to see...
Come on, let's see that lovely figure of yours!
So bold!
My, my! Trying to make us fall in love with you?
I knew playing with you would be fun!
You wouldn't dare say anything untoward, ~trash~, would you?
You're far too cute for ~trash~, ~target~. You should have someone who isn't such a disgusting, sweaty pervert!
Is this the sort of girl you're into, ~trash~? You don't have some sort of problem with girls like me, do you?
Look out, ~target~! ~Trash~ has that patented pervy look on his face!
You're such a cutie, ~target~! Like a precious little lamb.
~Target~ is so cute all around! Being around her just makes me feel so light!
She might look innocent, but I can tell you've got a naughty streak inside you.
So cute and petite! So, do you have to beat the men off with a stick or do you use something sharper?
I don't even have to guess what sort of filth is going through ~trash~'s mind.
Try and keep your gross cloud of perverted thoughts to yourself, ~trash~!.
Maybe it's time we put ~trash~ back on his leash.
Well, ~trash~? Aren't you going to say "thank you?" I think it's only appropriate for you to kowtow.
Feeling a bit more liberated now?
I hope you're not too nervous now! There's still more fun to be had!
I bet you break a lot of hearts back home, don't you?
I think it doesn't hurt to be free and easy every once and a while. Doesn't it feel nice?
Is this your type, ~trash~? Is that why you're here? Wow, what a stereotypical pervert.
If you're into women with large breasts, ~target~, it's possible you may have some sort of complex. Don't bring other people into it, okay?
How much is ~trash~ allowed to drool, ~target~? Best to set a hard limit now before his little peanut brain shuts off.
Time to prostrate yourself, ~trash~, like the boob-crazed pervert you are.
Where is it you get your clothes? I should probably strong-arm Rec into going there to get me some that'll actually fit...
Always nice to meet someone who understand the struggle.
Do men bother you a lot? I feel like I could have a lot of fun if I stick around you.
Can I really say anything about this type of body without sounding conceited?
Wow, ~trash~! And to that before today you'd never seen a girl's pussy in real life!
So, ~trash~, think you can behave yourself?
Today is turning out quite educational for you, isn't it, ~trash~? Maybe you should stop gawking and take some good notes!
If I catch you staring too perversely, ~trash~, I'll drag you out of here by your neck.
Well, I hope it won't make you too self-conscious.
Oh! Lucky us! Or, maybe, unlucky you!
Now, who wouldn't admire a girl with this sort of backbone?
There's nothing to be embarrassed about! You can do it!
Oh, that's hot...
Veeery interesting...
~Target~ has been so nice to you, ~trash~. It's a shame you'd never ever be able to even come close to repaying her in your lifetime.
... ~Trash~ looks so nervous...
I think you've been far too lenient with ~trash~, ~target~. He was already lacking in basic manners. What a shame. I'll just have to discipline him properly.
... ~Trash~ is... he can't even...
It is a little exciting to see you like this in this context...
Maybe you can spin around and show us that butt of yours!
